mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(g.garbage_id) FROM garbage g LEFT JOIN garbage_garbage_category_relation gcr ON g.garbage_id=gcr.gcr_garbage_id LEFT JOIN garbage_category gc ON gc.gc_id=gcr.gcr_gc_id LEFT JOIN user_garbage_relation ugr ON g.garbage_id=ugr.ugr_garbage_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id=ugr.ugr_user_id WHERE g.garbage_id =#{garbageId} AND u.user_id=#{userId}
